tool_description: Roll as many dice of any size as many times you want with the ultimate dice rolling API.
name: Dice Roll Simulator
title: Dice Roll Simulator

api_list.name: Regular die
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dice-roll-simulator.p.rapidapi.com/regular-die"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dice-roll-simulator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dice-roll-simulator.p.rapidapi.com/regular-die"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dice-roll-simulator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
